name: Katamari Bootleg
description:
I made it on my own since there is no new work. This is the first time in my life that I have created a game, so please be gentle with me.

All 3D models, etc. are self-made.

This project was created for learning purposes and there are no specific plans for updates, etc. Sorry.

W：Move Forwards

S：Back

D：Turn Left

A：Turn Right

ESC：Open Menu
